result.eng: As is usual all over Europe.
result.ga: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.orig: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.html: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.
result.ponchtml: De réir mar is gnáċ ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: In the usual place, I guess.
result.html: Sa ghnáth-áit is dóchaIn the usual place, I guess.
result.ponchtml: Sa ġnáṫ-áit is dóċaIn the usual place, I guess.

result.eng: I turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
result.ga: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil
result.orig: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáil
result.html: Chuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil chun nuachtchlár na maidine a chloisteáilI turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
result.ponchtml: Ċuireas an raidió ar siúl mar ab iondúil ċun nuaċtċlár na maidine a ċloisteáilI turned on the radio, as usual, to listen to the morning's news programme.
